name: js-bangla-calendar
description: Bangla Calendar using HTML, CSS and Vanila JS

scripts.dist:
if [ -d 'dist' ] 
 then 
 rm -rf dist 
 else 
 mkdir dist 
 fi
scripts.optimize-css: postcss src/style.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output dist/style.css
scripts.build: npm run dist && cp -R assets dist && npm run minify-html && npm run optimize-css && npm run minify-js

author: sabihajyoti22
